item.title: Toxicokinetics and recovery studies of dicamba dimethyl amine salt in goats following single oral administration
item.description: DDAS persists in the body for a shorter period and its major excretory route is through urine. DDAS has lower affinity to accumulate in tissues, and intensity of cellular alterations is not severe after single-dose oral administration.
